search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Accredible Certificates (accredible.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

citations.title: Pricing to fit your digital credentialing needs - Accredible

extracted_content.content:
Accredible Pricing
===============
        Cookie Settings       

[**Introducing Digital Credential Transcripts: A Better Way to Recognize Prior Learning - Learn more**](https://www.accredible.com/blog/introducing-digital-credential-transcripts-a-better-way-to-recognize-prior-learning)

![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/6627f257575ab3592de8c3aa_Group%208988382.webp)

*   Platform
    
    ![Image 57](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/66280c7b9560212f37cb5088_AdobeStock_664215817%201.webp)**Digital Credential Platform**
    
    Create, issue, and manage digital certificates and badges at any scale with the world’s leading platform.
    
    [Explore ![Image 58: Arrow pointing right ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2558d9f3ac6c64f1b8bb1/661b126d122a164fb64986a5_Group%208988382.webp)](https://www.accredible.com/platform)

    [**Feature Overview** All the tools you need to elevate program value.](https://www.accredible.com/features)

    [**Email Campaigns** Boost engagement with tailored, automated emails.](https://www.accredible.com/blog/beyond-issuance-how-organizations-use-email-campaigns-to-increase-learner-engagement)
    
    [**Transcripts** Ensure learning is recognized with verified records.](https://www.accredible.com/blog/introducing-digital-credential-transcripts-a-better-way-to-recognize-prior-learning)

Pricing to fit your digital credentialing needs
===============================================

Our plans are priced by the number of recipients — not credentials — so you can issue unlimited credentials per unique recipient per year.

Launch

Everything you need to start issuing verifiable digital credentials to your learners.

Starts at

$996

12-month term; billed monthly

[Sign Up](https://dashboard.accredible.com/issuer/sign_up?source=AccredibleWebsitePricingPageSelfservePlan&_gl=1*1nxe8ok*_gcl_au*MjA2ODM1Mjc4OC4xNzE3MjU5Nzk5*_ga*OTUzMTQ2MzU2LjE3MTcyNTk3OTk.*_ga_FSDJZHHBH0*MTcxNzc1NTkzNy4yMy4xLjE3MTc3NTg1MjAuNjAuMC41ODI4Mzk4NjQ.&_ga=2.34426914.221489880.1717411927-953146356.1717259799)

#### Frequently Asked Questions

Credential Recipients

How many credentials can I issue per recipient?

You can issue as many certificates and badges to a person as you'd like.

Do I pay for my old recipients?

No. Each plan has a limit on the number of unique recipients per year.

Do credential recipient allowances expire?

Each plan limits the number of unique people you can create a certificate or badge for per year.

Can recipients pay Accredible to receive their certificate?

No. Accredible cannot be used as an ecommerce solution to charge certificate or badge recipients in exchange for their credentials. The credentials you issue are paid out of your allowance.

Is there an ongoing fee for maintaining the link for each certificate?

There are no additional costs to keep the certificate "live" after it is issued. However, if a certificate expires and you need to re-issue a new one, that will require an additional credit.

What if I need more recipients? Can I change my plan?

Yes, you may upgrade to a larger package at any time.

What is a unique recipient?

You can send as many certificates and badges to each person as you like; we price based on the number of unique people you send them to.  
  
For example, sending multiple certificates or badges to 'yourname@example.com' only counts as one credit against your plan's allowance, provided they're sent in the same year in your billing cycle.You don't pay ongoing carrying fees; existing credentials never count against your allowance.

Plan Details

Can I pay for a year all at once instead of the monthly amount?

All Launch plans are billed monthly on an annual commitment. We have more flexibility on payment terms if you purchase a Connect or Growth plan.

What other fees are involved?

There are no additional fees (like setup or maintenance) beyond the cost of your plan level and any add-on features you've selected.

How long is a contract?

Accredible offers one year and multi-year contracts

What happens to the certificates or our account if we don’t continue our subscription?

Issued digital credentials remain active (as long as you have not put an expiration date on them). For cancellations part way through a year, please refer to our [Cancellation and Refund policy](https://help.accredible.com/s/article/accredible-cancellation-and-refund-policy).

Are plans priced in US dollars?

Yes, plans are priced in USD. Accredible can provide quotes in AUD, EUR, and GBP upon request.

Ready to get started?
